CAF Director Transportation

The Director Transportation (D Tn) is responsible to develop and provide strategic transportation (transport, traffic and movement, dangerous goods and postal) policies and procedures to the Canadian Armed Forces and the Department of National Defence and the necessary transportation tools to support CF operations.

 

D Tn is part of the Assistant Deputy Minister Materiel Group.

 

D Tn Policy that affect leaders of the CCO:

A-LM-158-005/AG-001,   TD 569 Annex A
